function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Training on proper ppe use, regular ppe inspections","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of international and local guidelines, and prompt implementation of updated recommendations.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishment of an expert team trained in infectious disease control and workplace safety, regular review of control measures.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, enforcement of hygiene protocols","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Installation of air purifiers, regular maintenance of ventilation systems","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use secure and verified encoding and decoding algorithms, regular data backups, and avoid executing unknown or untrusted code.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use appropriate encoding or language translation technology","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement hygiene measures, social distancing, and vaccination","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improve ventilation systems and air circulation, implement air purification technologies","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement regular and thorough cleaning protocols, promote good hygiene practices","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit occupancy, reconfigure spaces","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clarify and decode any ambiguous or encoded parts of the text. use secure channels for communication.","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strict hygiene and cleaning protocols, promoting vaccination, and enforcing social distancing measures can mitigate the risk.","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Develop and enforce strict regulations for animal markets and animal handling practices","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of shared surfaces, promotion of hygienic practices in public spaces","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reducing occupant density and increasing ventilation","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved ventilation and spatial layout, limiting occupant density","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of air filtration systems and regular cleaning of surfaces","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent hand hygiene, use of disinfectants on surfaces","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces, use of protective barriers","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, proper hand hygiene","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Proper sanitation and hygiene practices, safe disposal of waste","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Air quality monitoring, ventilation improvement, use of face masks","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing efficient air filtration systems and ventilation in residential, commercial, and hospital environments","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular inspection and maintenance of filtration systems to ensure proper sealing and functioning.","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and enforce proper handwashing techniques and hygiene practices","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote social distancing and avoid close contact with infected persons","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Provide clear guidelines on mask usage and prioritize access to masks for high-risk individuals","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, closure of high-occupancy areas, and promotion of non-health-care-setting social-distancing measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased awareness and training on environmental precautions, use of effective chemical deactivation methods for viral particles on surfaces","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remove items from sink areas and clean countertops with 10% bleach solution or alcohol-based cleaner","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Post signage about the effectiveness of handwashing, provide access to alcohol-based hand sanitizer, ensure soap dispensers are full, and implement routine surface cleaning protocols","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhanced building hvac operational practices, proper filter installation, and maintenance.","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use energy-efficient hvac systems and technologies to minimize the impact of increased air fractions on energy consumption","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in air-handling systems with the capability to increase outside air fractions, or implement alternative measures to improve indoor air quality","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on increasing outside air fraction along with airflow rates, and utilize air purification technologies to reduce the transmission potential of indoor air","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintain indoor humidity between 40% and 60% to limit the spread of viruses","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ensure indoor humidity is maintained within the recommended range to minimize the inactivation of viruses","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Maintain optimal indoor humidity levels to minimize the impact on susceptibility and viral particle deposition","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Monitor and control indoor humidity levels to prevent overhumidification","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Targeted in-room humidification, monitoring of humidity levels","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement temperature regulation systems and provide guidelines for safe window ventilation practices.","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement social distancing guidelines, promote use of face masks, and provide guidelines for safe window ventilation practices.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research on the impact of natural light on sars-cov-2 indoors and provide updated guidelines based on new findings.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Properly install uvgi in mechanical ventilation paths or upper-room applications to indirectly treat air through convective air movement.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to understand the effects of daylight and develop mitigation strategies based on the findings.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper implementation of spectrally tuned electric lighting for disinfection indoors based on research and best practices.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further research to verify the margin of safety before implementation, and implement with appropriate precaution.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Consider implementing social-distancing measures, limiting occupant density, and understanding the spatial disposition to make informed decisions.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designate separate zones for different patient groups, strict cleaning protocols, and use of ppe","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"}]}
